mapper.select: SELECT ci.comment_id AS commentId, # 评论id su.user_id AS userId, # 用户id su.user_name AS userName, # 用户名称 su.user_avatar AS userAvatar, # 用户头像 ci.content, # 评论内容 ci.create_time AS createTime, # 评论时间 ci.like_count AS likeCount # 评论点赞数 FROM comment_info ci JOIN sys_user su ON ci.user_id = su.user_id WHERE ci.target_type = #{targetType} AND ci.target_id = #{targetId} AND ci.level = 1 and ci.delete_flag = 0 and su.delete_flag = 0 ORDER BY ci.like_count DESC

SELECT ci.comment_id AS commentId, # 评论id su.user_id AS userId, # 用户id su.user_name AS userName, # 用户名 su.user_avatar AS userAvatar, # 用户头像 ci.content, # 评论内容 ci.create_time AS createTime, # 评论时间 ci.like_count AS likeCount # 评论点赞数 FROM comment_info ci JOIN sys_user su ON ci.user_id = su.user_id WHERE ci.parent_comment_id = #{parentCommentId} AND ci.delete_flag = 0 AND su.delete_flag = 0 ORDER BY ci.like_count DESC
